table.caption: Outlands Giants
rows: Several {@creature Cyclops||cyclopes} refuse to let the characters pass through a region where they're constructing a massive ring of beautifully carved standing stones.

An {@creature ettin} influenced by {@book the Beastlands|MPP|0|The Beastlands} has one head with bovine features and one head with lupine features. It desperately needs help finding something both heads are willing to eat.
A {@creature storm giant} seeks the characters' help in finding an offering of significant worth and size to impress the god Annam.
A jade-skinned {@creature oni} from Bytopia has become separated from the spirit she was bound to protect. She requests aid in catching up to her lost ward.
table.name: Outlands Giants
